Reviews.Title: “Good place.. Clean and away from the noise and traffic.”
Reviews.Author: Tresleches
Reviews.Content: This hotel is perfect for people who want to be close to the downtown area in Ponce.

Reviews.Title: “Expected better from a franchise hotel...”
Reviews.Author: Scott R
Reviews.Content: Originally, I reserved/paid for a room for a long term (3mo or longer) stay two weeks in advance - a suite, with fridge, decent a/c, micro, decent bed, etc. The first night - my room was not available. Second night, I was moved to another room - one they thought was more suited to my reservation - not. I was working 12 hrs a day from the start and really didn't need this additional headache. I finally discussed this matter with the actual Manager (after having to schedule an appt after hours)on the third night since i didn't usually didn't get back to the hotel till late. I was then "promised" a fridge "soon", they brought me a micro right away the next day, said they would fix the a/c, re-check the toilet that never seemed to flush right, and a different mattress that didn't sag in the middle. In the days before I moved out, the toilet still flushed the same despite numerous reports it had been fixed - the a/c unit was finally replaced after 8 days (not during the day, but that night after I got back to the room). The fridge was still a no show as was the mattress. When they saw me carry all my luggage through the lobby at 5am, they acted surprised I was checking out. The only adjustment to my weekly rate was about 10 USD. On a good note - the staff will gladly help/listen to you with any problems you have - promise everything will be taken care of tomorrow - just as soon as they get done texting, chatting, or conversing - you will get full attention. When my cell charger mysteriously went missing from the room (just a day before I checked out), they gladly offered me a box from the back room full of chargers from the past 10 years - I was told to take what/how many I wanted. Unfortunately, no one had lost a charger recently that matched mine... The in-house restaurant food was excellent - albeit, menu somewhat limited, with only one cook, and one waiter that doubled as the cooks helper, wait times were sometimes lengthy. In short - this is not a "resort Hotel" - I knew that - but I could tell a lot of others did not. I really cannot recommend for any stay longer than a week. Stay if you have too - but have a "Plan B"

Reviews.Title: “Only stay here if you NEED to be close to the airport”
Reviews.Author: loganst
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Pone HoJo for one night so that we were closer to the airport for our morning departure. The proximity to the airport was the only thing that they managed to deliver. Upon arrival we needed to wait for the receptionist to finish her call with her friend to check-in. When entering our lovely room we found a mound of ants, a brown spotty ceiling from water damage and mattress fit for torture. That was the good part. Do yourself a favor, Ponce is small and easy to get around. Stay somewhere, anywhere, else. Oh, I forgot to mention that I took the trash from our dinner downstairs to throw away so that we wouldn't attract more bugs. When asking the receptionist for the location of the trash can, she pointed to the parking lot and got back on her phone call with her friend again.

Reviews.Title: “Not sure if I'd recommend it or not.”
Reviews.Author: jl21Va
Reviews.Content: I got a good multi-day rate through Expedia which made it a value good value. When we first arrived, we were pleasantly suprised at how spacious the hotel was. It seemed clean and fairly modern/efficient. We stayed 4-nights though and as time wore on we became more aware of its flaws. Here are some: Very small ants are all over the place. Loud hallway since we were close to front. Toilet backed up a couple times and had to be plunged. That said, the pool was pretty good size (though chilly) and really the place met our needs. One other note is that they do not have an elevator and the upstairs rooms are for smoking. Get a first floor room, even if it means less privacy. They sent us up there first and the smell told me right away to go back and get something better.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: Dan M
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at this hotel many times over the past 8 years because it is close to where I work. The hotel is clean and the service is excellent. This is the best value you will find in the area. It is not on the ocean, so don't expect a beach front view. However, the pool area is very nice and a good place for the family to hang out. The restaurant is open for breakfast and dinner, but was closed for lunch during my last stay. Be sure to check the hours, as that may change

Reviews.Title: “Improve hotel”
Reviews.Author: Beverly G
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the hotel on the weekend of 11-11 until 11-13 2011. Attendance and service at the front desk was good. Everyone was pleasent and helpful. The blanket on both beds had holes in it. Did not give a good impression. The towels were supposed to be white but looked grey. There were no shower caps. On a whole the room was clean. Hope they improve for the tourist season. Since they have a good location by the Mercedita Airport, just 5 minutes away.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay..”
Reviews.Author: Carmen C
Reviews.Content: The staff was very nice and polite. Housekeeping was great. The room was clean.

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Hotel”
Reviews.Author: niqr
Reviews.Content: This hotel is outside the city. Iâ€™ve stayed here twice and the first time the room (outside road view) had a funky smell, but it was clean. The second time I got a first floor pool access room and it was much better. Although the rooms run a little on the small side. The pool is really good and the water is warm. The reservation / check-in / check-out process has really fast and the employees were friendly. The arcade room is really small and has only about 6 machines. Ponce Mall is just 6 min away by car.

Reviews.Title: “No flair, but no complaints”
Reviews.Author: RainDelay
Reviews.Content: This hotel provides an American-style chain hotel experience. The rooms are clean, but not sparkling. There is very little external noise. There is nothing to the interior of the building that differentiates it as Puerto Rican as opposed to Pennsylvanian, or anywhere else. I was disappointed that the pool closes early and there is no continental breakfast. The front desk staff were cheerful and it was easy to find off the highway exit 99. It is good if you are passing through for a night and need a comfortable bed at a reasonable price. It is not great if you are looking for a more exotic feel to your vacation.

Reviews.Title: “very nice, clean, friendly people”
Reviews.Author: mariaelena50
Reviews.Content: stayed there for 6 days. the hotel was clean, the people at the hotel were friendly and the host and hostess in the restaurant were very nice . liked the pool, always had clean towel and didnt have to ask for any.they always made sure we had enought. Needed more verity in the menu..

Reviews.Title: “Off the beaten path”
Reviews.Author: ewills79
Reviews.Content: The hotel was nice, clean, and safe with a friendly staff. I was disappointed in the gym as it didn't have much equipment and half of what was there was not working and when you go to the pool you have to go to the front desk for towels. The hotel is right off the highway and it isn't terribly hard to get into downtown Ponce, but it is a little farther than what you think.

Reviews.Title: “Not Comfortable Rooms Out-dated”
Reviews.Author: opinion1968
Reviews.Content: The staff Friendly the Pool Good enjoy it But your room has that thin, out-dated comforter that makes you feel that it is not clean. The linen maybe washed but you were Just Not Sure and wished you brought your own sheets and the mattress was the perfect addition to it - Old and Un-comfortable. The restraunt/diner charged my husband for Each Coffee - he had 2 cups. I don't know who stayed there in 2010 but Me and My family just went as for comfort and price I would NOT recommend it - nor return.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, good service”
Reviews.Author: jgrossnas
Reviews.Content: Nicely run hotel with friendly, helpful staff. Good restaurant and good pool and hot tub there tool

Reviews.Title: “one word FANTASTIC”
Reviews.Author: Gwadinina
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel with very nice staff ... and the other guests as well! The rooms were spacious, clean, light and fresh. The swimming pool area was great as well and the pool opening times even better ... up to 10pm! Nice location too ... 10/10 all the way!

Reviews.Title: “Best Value in Ponce”
Reviews.Author: amghco
Reviews.Content: Great location close to Ponce city and even closer to the Mercedita Airport. Highway # 52 is two minutes away, making it easier the access to other area atractions. The free parking is very convenient. Rooms are large and comfortables and the on site restaurant offers adequate service and food. With no doubt, best value hotel in Ponce.

Reviews.Title: “the people who works here are very kind and helpfull”
Reviews.Author: jamesmorales
Reviews.Content: exelent price, littel bit far from San Juan but it's Ponce has a lot to affer to the visitors who want to see the other side of Puerto Rico

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Customer Service, great hotel if on business!!”
Reviews.Author: keeptraveling01
Reviews.Content: Would stay in this hotel again without question. The customer service at the front desk, resturant, bar and cleaning staff was beyond reproach. While I had an excellent experience, rent a car if you don't have one. It is not in walking distance of anything except the post office. But the town center is only about a 10-15 minute drive. The pool was always clean. I was in it every night after work. The hot tub was good too. The breakfast is quick and easy. You can order off the menu but the buffet was fine for me. Dinner is not great for vegetarians so eat out or you can get a microwave and refrigerator for your room. There aren't many cable channels but it's Puerto Rico! Why are you watching TV?? I had to extend my stay a few times and the front desk manager worked hard to keep me in the same room even at the last minute and with the hotel sold out. Ample parking in the hotel lot. The staff is extremely helpful with directions and things to do in Ponce and throughout Puerto Rico. The price is perfect for the rooms. Kids seemed to enjoy the pool and breakfast buffet. If you stay on the 2nd floor, don't have a lot of luggage, there is no elevator. Handicapped rooms are available on the first floor. No luxuries here. There isn't alot to do at the hotel but great after a long day at work or if you do activities outside the hotel. A 5 to 10 minute drive from airport. Give this hotel a chance. I doubt you will be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Last Minute Stay”
Reviews.Author: elsoto1964
Reviews.Content: It was late when we arrived in Ponce hoping to find a descent hotel at a reasonable price. After many phone calls to other Hotels in the area, I was lucky to locate the HJ in Ponce. The staff was incredibly help-full, (maybe they sought our tired faces and took petty upon us) but whatever it was I was very pleased with their efficiency and friendly ways they treated us. The Hotel was in great condition and clean, the room was always keep in top shape and the staff was very accommodating to our needs. They were very friendly. Kudos to the front desk, thanks.

Reviews.Title: “Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: papi1096
Reviews.Content: Stayed here one night while traveling through the southern part of PR. Room and hallways are very dark. retro looking room. Onsite restaurant and bar. Large courtyard swimming pool and hot tub. Clean and no frills not bad for a nights sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay if you are only going to sleep in it...”
Reviews.Author: Dark_Pixie
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a nice place to stay... I went there with my husband for a mini vacation 5 days/ 4 nights for a great deal $240 (tax included) which I booked to have a nice time visiting the island and some point of interest that I always heard as a kid but never got the chance to visit... I cant complain of this hotel. It was nice, very clean, and confy... The employees were very polite, accomodating and helpful.. But it is only good if you are on a business trip, if you are visting relatives, going to a wedding or just for visiting the island like I was ... but if you are expecting luxury and being pampered this is not your place... Amenities: It has 2 jacuzzis (1 hot, 1 cold), a pool (that was very warm when I went in to have fun with my husband), the hotel was empty so that was a plus... we had it for ourselves... they are open only until 10pm, they were clean, free of mold or other floating things and that was good too... they also have a pool bar but it was closed my whole stay... They have nice landscaping, a little garden near the pool, umbrellas with chairs, wifi, a restaurant, a gym (I cant tell what was in it because my key never opened the door to it and I had to be with a security guard so I just quit trying to get in)... they have a game room with couple of old games...and a salon... I think thats it... Surroundings: The parking lot was spacious, it is near supermarkets, airports, schools, post office... they give you maps to travel around... I took my GPS, I got lost with their maps... but the intention is what it counts... Service: All the employees were very nice, friendly and polite. The manager gave us a 50% off card to play golf at Costa Caribe Golf Course as soon as she saw us talking about golf and saw our clubs... that was very nice, they were paying attention to every detail... there was one time I needed a plate and a spoon to eat something in my room and they were able to get it for me and I wasnt eating from the restaurant, and other time I needed a glass of milk and they got me one quickly without asking... Housekeeping: They cleaned the room every day, they left us plenty of soap, coffee (yey!!!) and towels (Tip: take your own towels, the ones from the hotel are very small)... Maintenance They were remodeling the rooms, they were cleaning all the time, the halls were clean, some smell like cigarrett but it came from the rooms... so if you dont like that smell you will have to work with it because there is a section of the rooms in the hotel where you can smoke in them. Other than that everything was fine. Restaurant: I cant comment in regards to the food or the restaurant because I never went there to eat. I can say that they were very polite and helped me when I needed from them but thats it. I went to eat out of the hotel, I ate a full breakfast (2 egs, jam and cheese, bread toasts, juice or coffee for $2.99)... lunch for $6.95 and dinner for the same... you can go to the town and find a lot of places cheaper than the hotel restaurant... Opportunities: 1. They dont have elevators, so if your room is on the 2nd floor make sure you use the cart to carry your stuff near the steps to your room... 2. They dont have a bellboy to take care of your luggage when you arrive so prepare to take care of that yourself... 3. Your room key might give you problems so try to get a room with the new lock. 4. Cable suck big time, after being on the road the whole day, we went to the pool to relax and then went to our room to plan our next day while watching TV, but my god my TV reception was horrible and barely watchable... I think that I was able to watch like 3 or 5 channels... I didnt bother to call front desk because eventually I was so exhausted that I fell asleep... but that was something that I didnt like... 5. Bigger towels. 6. To maintain the pool opened after 10pm, and open the pool bar during the day or night, have music and drinks at the pool... Other than that, I dont believe there's something else that I found wrong... Overall Experience It was a great deal which I wasnt able to reject, I had a great time and I just used the hotel to sleep, and that was fine for the price I paid... I do recommend it to others!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: cvuser
Reviews.Content: We were there one night and went back for two nights the next weekend. We were very happy with the hotel. I'm glad I didn't read the prior reviews or I might not have stayed there. The rooms were very clean. The pool and hot tub was great even with a lot of people there on Good Friday weekend, There seemed to be plenty of staff and they where very friendly. We didn't have the beakfast but the restaraunt kept very busy.

Reviews.Title: “Beware of the charges to your credit card”
Reviews.Author: clientaSanjuan
Reviews.Content: They charged me illegally 3 nights on my credit card. Ana Irma Rivera Lassen

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Vacationer45
Reviews.Content: Two words will best describe this place.....bed bugs!!

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs”
Reviews.Author: edohrn
Reviews.Content: We are infested with bed bug bites. Do not stay at this hotel. We were there 5 nights this past week and have just finished bagging all of our clothing, suitcases, backpacks, etc... and put them in the garage to kill the bugs that we inevitably brought home. We are itching and having allergic reactions to the bites. We were in room 141. I requested a refund from HoJo, but I'm sure they will just laugh at us! Plus, this is not near anything-you must drive everywhere.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible stay; non-responsive management”
Reviews.Author: ilovebaltimore
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on New Year's Eve, because of the proximity to the Ponce airport . When we checked in, we advised that we had a 6am flight and needed a 3:45 am wake up call. Beginning at approx. 8pm, we heard very loud music coming from a poolside DJ. There were no guests around the pool. We called the front desk on several occasions and merely asked that the volume be turned down, so we could get to sleep. Each time, we were assured this would be done, but nothing happened. Finally, around 11pm, I went to the front desk in my robe and asked to see the manager. We were advised that the DJ refused to reduce the volume. There were no other rooms available, and we were told we would receive a refund for the night, since our room faced the pool and the music was too loud to permit sleep. After several follow-ups with the hotel, we never received the promised refund.

Reviews.Title: “If you like the smell of mildew...this is the place for you”
Reviews.Author: missesc
Reviews.Content: I along with half of my bridal party booked our stay for a few days in order to save some money as we were going to stay at Ponce Hilton for two days. I must say after two days we went over to the Ponce Hiltion because we couldn't take it anymore. First and foremost the motel is overpriced for it's ammenities or lack thereof. On the second day a pipe broke and we didnt' have running water for at least six hours. My husband had to wash my hair with cold water bottles. After having a lengthy debate with the manager I was discounted a night's stay. The gym had ONE working treadmill that had one key...so if a guest used a key and forgot to return it no one was able to use the treadmill. There is no elevator so if you have a second floor room get ready to carry your luggage to the second floor amidst the hallways that smell like mildew or rotting towels..pick one. On the upside the complimentary soap smells great, and the motel is near everything. I would recommend this place if you had no where else to stay and would NOT stay past one night.

Reviews.Title: “Good for 1 night”
Reviews.Author: JSLPuertoRico
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel. Nice for a 1 nite staying. near from ponce airport and the freeway. also near from the mall and the city center.I have to stay in this hotel several times on the year and is very nice. the pool is nice the parking is average.the room is good. good continental breakfast.good staff.the pool is good. the gardens are nice.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel - GREAT STAFF!”
Reviews.Author: JimboinATL
Reviews.Content: The hotel was OK, but the staff really shined. They treated my wife & I with wonderful service and great smiles. The pool looked nice, but usually had a herd of young children in it and so we never really got into it. This is no reflection of the hotel - just the time that we were there. But the real star here is not the hotel at all - As I said the hotel is so-so. The STAFF is the real star. They helped us with directions, WIFI Hook-ups, Phone service, Restaurants, Use of their business office (FREE!) as well as many great smiles. THANKS Folks! All in All a very good stay.

Reviews.Title: “enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: kacyOntario
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 7 nights for a business/pleasure trip. The room was very comfortable, staff friendly and helpful, and the pool very clean. The pool area is very nice with a bar. We found the restaurant serviceable but nothing great. The continental breakfast had a good selection of pastries, cereal, toast,etc with coffee and juices. Having a washer and dryer available was handy and reasonably priced, never had to wait to use it. Would definitely return.
